Totem Shield

shield (lvl 4)

item id [id]: 160
armor id [armor]: 235 (Magic Leather Shield)
protection, shield [protshield]: 13
parry [parry]: 4
national discount [nationrebate]: #53 MA Machaka - Reign of Sorcerors
#11 EA Machaka - Lion Kings
(curses-attacker [curseattacker])

Requires 5N5S to forge (N1S1)

The head painted on this shield will cast curses on anyone striking its bearer. The Totem Shield is often used by evil witch doctors to discourage people from attacking them.
